creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: dark maroon shawl with aqua and white field of embroidered flowers surrounded by border of similar design and same colors; loosely fringed border with solid edges
dimension: 78 1/4 x 35 1/4 in. (198.76 x 89.54 cm) (including fringe and hem)
title: Shawl
